title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2404/84 of 14 August 1984 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 determining the intervention centres for cereals
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2404/84
of 14 August 1984
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 determining the intervention centres for cereals
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Part 'FRANCE' of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 is hereby replaced by the following:
'Article 2
The intervention centres for sorghum shall be fixed as follows:
1.2.3 // Member State  // Department/Region  // Centre  // 1. France  // Haute-Garonne  // BaziĂ¨ge  // 2. Italy  // Emilia  // Bologna  //   // Marche  // Ancona  //   // Umbria 197, 30. 7. 1980, p. 1. (5) OJ No L 224, 17. 8. 1983, p. 5.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
